The grid

Requirements

Optimal at

1366x768 px
~19.5% of Swedens desktop screens (~56% is above this resolution)

Great at

768 px
Portrait iPad (~82% of Swedens tablets)
1024 px
Landscape iPad (~82% of Swedens tablets)

Good at

1920x1080 px
~20% of Swedens desktop screens
1440x900 px
~16.5% of Swedens desktop screens
360x640 px
360x640 & 375x667 is ~51% of Swedens mobile screens

This container is 50% of the row when on bigger screens. Look how nice it is.

This one is just one fourth of the width.

This is a paper content, also one fourth of the width.
This is a sink content that is one third of the width.
Look at this big paper container that is two thirds of the width. It's almost like a banner. I love banners.
